participant_1.background:
I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i m also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i ve never been to the beach.
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

participant_2.background:
I am a biker who likes Toyota cars and wears lots of leather.
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
I was raised in a small town where the people were friendly and the food was delicious.
I try to do my laundry every week, but it doesn't always happen.
my eyes are brown.

content.text: Hey! How's your day been going?
It's been good! I just got back from a long ride on my bike.
Nice! I love riding bikes! I have a Toyota Tacoma too.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to go on a road trip in a Tacoma.
I've done a few, they're so fun! I love just driving and seeing the country.
Me too! I'm not close with my family so I like to spend time alone.
I'm not close with my family either, so I understand that.
It can be lonely sometimes, but it's also nice to have your own space.
Totally! I like being able to do what I want, when I want.
Same here! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm sure we'll get along great.
